Articles.Content:
I may stream some games over the summer, and thought to check with forum staff before starting to see if there were any restrictions on game genre or contents before getting myself in trouble. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT:

I meant for games that I would post about here or place on the streaming schedule, not just off-site Twitch streams.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-30T02:13:13Z" title="05/30/2015 02:13  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 30, 2015</time> by Starwhip**
The only restrictions are set by the community rules, in the forbidden content area ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Thank you! \*checks a few games off list\*
